main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported over England AFB, Louisiana in November 1960.
interesting points: One sighting involved a round white object, about half the size of the full moon, observed for about 10 minutes before vanishing., Radar sightings confirmed visual sightings of small, round, bright white objects with flashing lights., Witnesses described one object maneuvering in a bizarre manner over the base for 30 seconds., A control tower operator reported three disc-shaped objects estimated to be 10-15 feet in diameter., The weather conditions during all sightings were clear with excellent visibility.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects, round white object, disc-shaped objects
witness description: Witnessed by an unknown lieutenant and control tower operator
